void ACIA_sysdep::InterruptEm (   ) 
 

Send a char through the socket and drain the output register

void ACIA_sysdep::InterruptRec (   ) 
 

Check if there is incoming char. Schedule itself in order to be executed in a while. This cycle start when the ACIA_sysdep object is created.

void ACIA_sysdep::SendChar (   ) 
 

Schedule an interrupt in order to simulate the output register dumping.
